name: Dungeon sweeper (imar13)
description:
Welcome to the dungeon, where dreams become true as people find infinite riches in the depths of these dark old structures. You are an aspiring new worker seeking riches in the dungeon, only in a different way then most adventurers...

Due to circumstances this weekend my time making the game was cut substantially so the final product is less then I hoped for. While playable this would in my opinion not even suffice as a early prototype. With alot of things missing.

I hope you will have fun playing this short experience regardless as I had a lot of fun making it!
